players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Bob, I didn’t kill Charlie. I think Alice is the real threat. We should focus on her."
Bob: "Charlie was killed last night. I investigated Diana and she's the mafia."
You: "I trust Bob's investigation. Diana is mafia. Vote her."
Diana: "Bob, maybe you misinterpreted. I didn't kill Charlie. Maybe you are the mafia. Alice is innocent."
Bob: "Alice, you’re safe. Diana is the mafia. Vote her."
You: "Bob, your investigation of Diana fits detective role; we should vote her."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Bob, I didn’t kill Charlie. I think Alice is the real threat. We should focus on her."
You: "Charlie was killed last night. I investigated Diana and she's the mafia."
Alice: "I trust Bob's investigation. Diana is mafia. Vote her."
Diana: "Bob, maybe you misinterpreted. I didn't kill Charlie. Maybe you are the mafia. Alice is innocent."
You: "Alice, you’re safe. Diana is the mafia. Vote her."
Alice: "Bob, your investigation of Diana fits detective role; we should vote her."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested
